stimulusHtml: The United States and the European Union are trading partners with flexible exchange rates. The currency of the United States is the dollar ($), and the currency of the European Union is the euro. Which of the following is true if the exchange rate between the euro and the dollar changes from $1.00 per euro to $1.25 per euro?
choicesHtml: United States exports to Europe will increase.
European exports to the United States will increase.
The money supply in the United States will increase.
